name: Attack on Fort Ticonderoga
description:
Attack on Fort Ticonderoga

This is a 2D top down simulation game made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 5.

Click the symbol of either the infantryman or the cannon to have one assault the fort. Infantry move faster and can attack the incoming British soldiers, whereas cannons move straight toward the fort, ignoring the redcoats. Attacking the fort will kill troops that are inside.

When there are no more British troops inside the fort, you win. If you run out of reinforcements, troops, and the fort still has troops in it, you lose.

Made with help by ThomDotCom
